prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_AF01",
  "name": "Family AirFryer Weeknight Wins",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat",
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "SemiPrepared"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "BBQ Chicken Strip Wraps with Slaw & Corn",
  "description": "Fast, kid‑friendly BBQ chicken wraps using the air fryer with crunchy slaw and sweet corn. Minimal prep and quick assembly for weeknights.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat air fryer to 200°C/390°F.",
    "Set out 8 tortilla wraps on a board or plate.",
    "Place slaw in a bowl and have barbecue sauce ready.",
    "Rinse and drain corn; pat dry with a paper towel.",
    "Have a microwave-safe plate ready for warming wraps."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Air-fry chicken strips in a single layer for 6–8 minutes until hot and crisp, shaking halfway.",
    "Microwave tortilla wraps (stacked and covered with a damp paper towel) for 20–30 seconds to soften.",
    "Assemble wraps: add a handful of slaw, a few chicken strips, and spoonfuls of corn to each wrap.",
    "Drizzle barbecue sauce over the filling.",
    "Roll and serve immediately; add extra sauce on the side if desired."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken strips",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "air-fry from chilled/frozen per pack"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tortilla wraps",
      "quantity": "8 small wraps",
      "preparation": "warm to soften"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "slaw",
      "quantity": "300 g",
      "preparation": "ready to use"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "corn",
      "quantity": "2 cups kernels",
      "preparation": "rinse and drain"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "barbecue sauce",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "for drizzling"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "American",
      "Mexican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild",
      "NoHeat"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer",
      "Microwave"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
